name: serena
description: AI-powered memory and context management system with semantic search, project-specific prompts, and intelligent codebase understanding

prerequisites.description: Requires Python 3.8+, uv package manager, and optional language servers for enhanced code understanding
steps: Install uv package manager: curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh
Optional: Install typescript-language-server for TS/JS support
Optional: Install pyright for Python support
